items.sentence: Tom has to do it by himself. Nobody is allowed to help him.
Tom was about to leave when it started raining really hard.
Tom gave Mary a ring that once belonged to his grandmother.
Tom got out of the car, but Mary remained behind the wheel.
Mary is one of the girls that Tom is interested in meeting.
Mary was sitting in front of the mirror, brushing her hair.
Tom said he couldn\'t leave without saying goodbye to Mary.
When I was young, I tried to read as many books as I could.
When I woke up this morning, the rain had turned into snow.
Why do you think Tom and Mary are planning to get divorced?
